means: 使统一，穿制服(uniform的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Only a uniformed guard stultified with boredom might have overheard them.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有一名穿制服的无聊警卫可能偷听到了他们的谈话。

sentence.Network_en: A uniformed chauffeur identified me among the crowd.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个穿制服的司机在人群中认出了我。

sentence.Network_en: A uniformed chauffeur stared straight ahead.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个穿制服的司机注视着正前方.

entry.def: If you use uniformed to describe someone who does a particular job, you mean that they are wearing a uniform.
